#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{   int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--){
   string s1,s2;
   int n;
   cin>>n>>s2;
   
   
   for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
{
    string s;
    int tmp=i;
    while(tmp!=0){
        int t=tmp%10;
        tmp/=10;
        s+=t+'0';
        
        
    }
    reverse(s.begin(),s.end());
    s1+=s;
}   

int ans=0;
int l1=s1.size(),l2=s2.size();
for(int i=0;i<l1;i++){
    if(s1[i]==s2[0] ){
        int j=0,count=0;
        while(s1[i+j]==s2[j] && i+j<l1){
            count++,j++;
        }
        if(count==l2)ans++;
    }
}
cout<<ans<<endl;
}
    return 0;
}
